mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (id, password, nickName, email, address) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET password=#{password}, nickName=#{nickName}, email=#{email}, address=#{address} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.password, m.email, m.address, m.inserted, m.nickName, COUNT(b.id) numberOfBoard FROM Member m LEFT JOIN Board b ON m.id = b.writer GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.inserted DESC

SELECT m.id, m.password, m.email, m.address, m.inserted, m.nickName, COUNT(b.id) numberOfBoard FROM Member m LEFT JOIN Board b ON m.id = b.writer GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.inserted DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{items}
